The name at the top post is "Izuminokami Kanesada" which was the maker of H=
ijikata's blade. From what my translator picked up, the poster was able to =
visit someone who owned a Kanesada blade made by the 11th Kanesada. 

As fo=
r the overseas auctions/sales, there are currently two Kanesada blades for =
sale here in the U.S.

Aizu Kanesada wakizashi:
http://www.artswords.com/ai=
zukanesada.htm

Izuminokami Kanesada daito:
http://www.artswords.com/aizuka=
nesada.htm

The daito has appraisal papers, but they are not translated lik=
e the ones on the wakizashi. 


~Okita

body knew
